name: Jake Hill
text: This was the best pizza place in Carson City. As of today it is closing down and I am very sad. They had very affordable pizza and great drivers and I am very sad to see them go. Thank you for always making me happy with great pizza and I …More

name: Anthony
text: Finally a Papa John's local! Not a bad pie probably the best out of the big chains. This location was quick and delivered my pizza 10 min early!!! Good job guys!

name: Ruthann Shelby
text: I ordered a pizza last night expecting to get the same pie that I used to get in Jeffersonville Indiana. That is the home of Papa Johns . I was disappointed. This franchise owner obviously doesn't adhere to original recipes . I gladly …More

name: Matthew Schnurbusch
text: We have eaten Papa johns for a very long time, and typically enjoy. The 2 pizzas we had tonight, May 18 2018, were unequivocally the worst pizzas I have ever had. Very watery sauce,  and it was cold even though it was fresh (weird I know). …More

name: Annie White
text: I have eaten here a couple of times and both times i have been impressed by the quality of the food and the incredible service while i was picking up my pizza! You guys definitely rock when it comes to pizza and your not even that pricey!! Your actually, pretty dang cheap!!!!

name: Desiree Fournier
text: First time ordering from this pizza restaurant. Think I may have over estimated a bit. Got my delivery, the pan cheese pizza was pretty good but when I called about my second pizza, the manager kindly asked if I wanted them to make me …More

name: Jesse Coffman
text: Great pizza and friendly staff. Gave me a free water while I was waiting for my order. Excellent pizza!

name: steven severn
text: So excited to hear that Papa John's opened up in Carson City, got tired of driving to Reno to get a good pizza. To be honest at first ordering a pizza there took a little bit of time. Asked why this was was told that the crew was new once I heard this I understand and I don't mind waiting for a good hot fresh pizza.

name: Rob Beckley
text: So, while I understand the product is not going to look like the TV Ads, leaving the outside 2" of crust with no sauce, cheese or toppings, two only two slices of pepperoni on their Large Papa Johns Favorite Pan Pizza + two additions $18  - …More

name: Julie Flores
text: Has gotten ridiculous the past 6 months. Online order will tell you 30-45mins but the icon will never change from the "making" stage. The past 3 times we have ordered I would call to see what's going on after 30mins of it not changing and …More

name: Rakesh R S
text: Worst pizza chain... Took 20 minutes to take one order and here comes worst, after ordering she said waiting time is more than one hour. Make sure u have all the time in the world if you are going here.

name: Shauna Johnson
text:
Update:
Over a year later and I am STILL just as excited that Papa John's is here!  They send text coupons and the food is always SUPER fresh and the pizza always …More

name: Destiny Feagan
text: I have always had good experience the taste in the pizza just melts in your mouth. It's the only pizza I can eat the crust. All the emoployes are great

name: Katherine Vaughan
text: Have gotten pizza there 4-5 times in the last 3 months...pretty much each time there has been an issue with the order, last time  the crust was burned.  keep trying since they have Awesome specials.  Today I called to use my LRG777 coupon …More

name: Josh Hackle
text: Its a great place with a great atmosphere and friendly people. And great food its a wonderful place two get food

name: Harry Potter
text: Great deals good pizza..my family orders here every weekend..we love papa johns..the best is the great promo codes we receive by email...staff is very nice and professional on the phone, plus delivery is always on time..extra plates and cheese packets plus napkins..cant go better!

name: Shari Hannah
text: The most tasteless pizza for the price I have ever had.  Very stingy with the toppings too.  The chocolate chip cookie was good.  Won't be ordering from there again.

name: Joni
text:
I have ordered pizza from here twice now and both time is sucked!!
I decided to say something the second time and man the manger is a massive jerk with NO customer service skills at all. I will never spend money there again!!! -5 stars for sure

name: Peter Reinschmidt
text: Everything was very good and the crust was thin like I like it

name: Jeromy Dunkin
text: Drivers and Management do not know their operations. They adjust addresses and loose coupon codes to charge you more. When the price is on the box sticker, you can't tell me the driver does not have access to it. I will not be ordering from here again.

name: sefaroph
text: Best pizza in Carson and I'll put money on it. I'm not a gambling man either, just that confident.

name: jim A
text:
1 hour wait and that is after 15 min trying to get there attention just to take my order.
Pizza had skimpy toppings, 2 toppings covered only 10% of pizza.
First time customer and it will be the last time!

name: sankha chatterjee
text: Very friendly staffs and great service. Staffs are always quick to respond.

name: Yedur KJ
text: Have option for creating own pizza. Dipping & sauce are good too.

name: Theresa Stackhouse
text: Awesome pizza, delicious and love their buy one get one free deal on pizza!

name: Kalani Kane
text: Great pizza,  great prices....

name: Margie Allison
text: The Best Pizza in Carson City, NV! Customer Service was excellent!

name: Tyler Brennan
text: Great staff and food. Fast and friendly.

name: Annette Kawasaki
text: Fast courteous service pizza was very good too

name: Vic Ramirez
text: Pizza was supposed to arrive 30 minuets ago and the girl lied on the phone sayin it’s on the way not worth it

name: Kassidy Martin
text: I only get pizza here, it's yummy!

name: Justin Clifford
text: Food was ready when they said it would be and hooked me up with some plates since I wasn't going home with the pizza.

name: Michael Decio
text: Decent, not as good as Round Table

name: Kallen Ceragioli
text: Don't support racist white trash businesses. This is one of them. Go for Domino's instead.

name: me me
text: Their pan pizza is very crispy

name: Chris and Evelyn Edge
text: Very good signature pizza's

name: RINKU AGARWAL
text: I rate this 3/5. I had store pick up and order was ready before I reached the store. Employees were friendly except the manager there, which I don't care, everything was great except I wanted the pizza to be well cooked. But it wasn't.

name: Sean Spencer
text: This location is closed

name: andrea palmisano
text: It was awful!!!

name: dino wojtczak
text: Best pizza in town

name: Parker Schmid
text: I love this pizza!!!

name: Bailey Gonzales
text: I love papa John's!

name: Yvette Aceves
text: Lobe there pizza

name: Holly Mangum
text: Good food

name: Lidia Barrios
text: I like the pizza ..but I have to wait for 2 hrs to get it .......Its the worst fast food
